    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task(int duration,
            int timeRemaining,
            double rewardRate,
            int deadline,
            int arrivalTime,
            TaskType taskType)
        Constructor for task generation.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the task (time units)
        timeRemaining - the time remaining required to complete the task.
        rewardRate - how much reward an agent gets for working on this task
        deadline - when the task needs to be completed by
        arrivalTime - when the task is first known about
        taskType - the type of task that requires a specific capability to complete the task

      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String[] aTaskStringArray)
        Deprecated. System exit upon read input failure.Possibly should throw exception and handle during task set construction.
        Constructor for input file reads. The string array should be in the following format: {"id:val", "duration:val", "timeRemaining:val", "rewardRate:", "deadline:val", "arrivalTime:val", "type:val"}
        Parameters:
        aTaskStringArray - a String array representing all task characteristics, where each string consists of "characteristics:value"
